nodes.text: The Ruur Killik Hivewoods was a region in the southern end of King's Pass on the planet Alderaan that was named after the Ruur Killik nest, which during the Alderaan Civil War emerged from hibernation and established large hives throughout the area. House Organa's Wardpost Luurdes was located at the southern edge of the area, and its personnel worked to prevent the Killiks from spreading to the Alsakan Lowlands.
